title: Graph of Function - Intervals of Decrease

content.description:
The graph is labeled Graph of v.

The horizontal axis is labeled with t as the variable and ranges from 0 to 11 in increments of 1.

The vertical axis is labeled v of t and ranges from negative 3 to 3 in increments of 1.

The graph is composed of four line segments that are connected. Moving from left to right:

The first segment begins at the origin and moves down and to the right, ending at (3 comma negative 2).

The second segment begins at (3 comma negative 2) and moves up and to the right, passing through (4 comma 0) and ending at (5 comma 2).

The third segment begins at (5 comma 2) and extends horizontally, ending at (8 comma 2).

The fourth segment begins at (8 comma 2) and moves down and to the right, ending on the t axis at (10 comma 0).

An object travels along a horizontal line with velocity given by the function <math alttext="v"><mi>v</mi></math>. The graph of <math alttext="y equals v open parentheses t close parentheses"> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mi>v</mi> <mfenced> <mi>t</mi> </mfenced> </math>, which consists of four line segments, is shown for <math alttext="0 less or equal than t less or equal than 10"> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <mn>10</mn> </math>.
content.question: On which of the following intervals is the object’s velocity decreasing over the entire interval?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 less than t less than 4"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>4</mn></math>
<math alttext="5 less than t less than 8"><mn>5</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>8</mn></math>
<math alttext="8 less than t less than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn></math> only

<math alttext="0 less than t less than 3"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>3</mn></math> and <math alttext="8 less than t less than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="0 less than t less than 3"><mn>0</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>3</mn></math> and <math alttext="8 less than t less than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo><</mo><mi>t</mi><mo><</mo><mn>10</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
